featured.text: It’s tempting, when breathing the thin air of Bekoji, to focus on the special conditions of the place.
It is believed that this would be to the best interest of all people, __(25)__ teens who might be tempted to start smoking.

definition.en_def: To entice someone to do something, often something that is not good or advisable.
definition.example: She tried to tempt him with a delicious dessert.
